      • checkPredicateForOneObject

        protected TopLevelTransaction.Pair checkPredicateForOneObject(AbstractDomainObject obj,
                                                  Method predicate,
                                                  boolean wasConsistent)
        Checks one predicate for one AbstractDomainObject.
        Returns:
        the set of other objects on which the check depended (excluding the object itself), or null, if this predicate was already checked for this object (in which case the check is skipped)
